LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure by Google Cloud on Coursera

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: In today's scenario we see that there is a lot of injustice happening to the farmers when it comes to their selling of the farm products especially vegetables.The middle men make the most out of the transaction without working at all.So through our venture we would like to eliminate the middleman using the help of technology.It is a platform where the consumers can request for what they want and a pool of consumers can accept the request and then deliver the items.So this will eliminate the middleman and the profits can be shared among the farmers and discounted prices can be given to the consumer.
